name: Achilles
special_abilities: PLACE FACE DOWN AND SIDEWAYS UNDER AN OPPONENT'S FACE DOWN CARD.  IF IT IS UNDER A DRAGON, THAT DRAGON LOSES 1 STRENGTH WHEN DEFENDING AS LONG AS ACHILLES IS ON THE DRAGON.  DISCARD ACHILLES IF UNDER A TERRAIN CARD.
lore: Achilles was a Greek hero who was killed when Paris shot him in the heel with a poisoned arrow.
